Chapter 2224 - Chapter 2224:I Can Become A Divine Emperor

Chapter 2224:I can become a divine Emperor

Translator: 549690339

sigh, it’s all because of that battle back then that I almost died. If it weren’t for my unparalleled divine skills, you wouldn’t have been able to see me!

Dandan started sighing, but she quickly regained her spirits and said,”Who’s the oldest in the Gu family now?”

the oldest member of the Gu family is ancestor Ling Tian’s son, ancestor Gu Xinghui!

“Gu Xinghui, so it’s that little brat. Ask him to come and see me!”

Dandan said in a carefree manner, with the appearance of a senior expert.

The other members of the Gu family felt their eyelids twitching, and their expressions turned ugly.

Gu Xinghui was the old ancestor of the Gu family. He had lived since the ancient times and had lived for a long time. Now, he was called a little brat. What were they then?

However, when he remembered that the other party was the World Turtle from back then, he felt at ease.

Back then, the top ten warbeasts were all peak experts. The number of years they had lived was also shocking.

Senior turtle, please wait a moment. I’ll go report this to the ancestor!

The master of the Gu family cupped his fists and walked towards the palace in the depths of the Gu family.

Lu Ming and the rest did not have to wait long before they saw the master of the Gu family and an old man with white hair flying over.

The old man had a ruddy complexion and white hair. He was in high spirits and his eyes were extremely bright.

The master of the Gu family followed behind the old man with a respectful expression.

“We pay our respects to the ancestor!”

The Gu family members bowed to the old man at the same time.

Needless to say, this person was the oldest ancestor of the Gu family, Gu Xinghui.

“No need to be so polite!”

Gu Xinghui waved his hand and looked at dandan. He spread out his spiritual sense to sense dandan’s aura, and a hint of joy appeared on his face. “Senior turtle, it’s you!”

hahaha, that’s me. You little brat, I haven’t seen you for so many years and you’ve become so old. Haha, I’m still the younger one!

Dandan laughed.

senior turtle, I just heard that there’s a young brother who has yet to become a sovereign, but he has already mastered many nomological laws, even two ultimate maxims. Are you here for the method left behind by father? ”

Gu Xinghui asked directly.

that’s right. I heard that Gu Lingtian has been researching for his entire life, and when he was about to die, he gained a lot. So, 1 want to see what he has found!

Dandan said.

Gu Xinghui looked at Lu Ming in surprise.

He had lived for a long time. When he heard that someone could control so many laws, even two ultimate laws, before becoming a sovereign, even he couldn’t help but be shocked and curious.

“Little brother, can you show me your nomological laws?”

Gu Xinghui said.

“Alright!”

Lu Ming nodded. With a thought, seven types of laws appeared one after another.

Gu Xinghui’s eyes were extremely bright as he sighed repeatedly,” miracle, what a miracle!

After a while, he said,” my father did have a great breakthrough back then. He said that he finally found the way to become a saint Emperor. Unfortunately, he couldn’t reach it himself. He could only leave it to the fated!

Lu Ming’s eyes lit up and his heart could not help but beat faster.

Gu Xinghui’s words obviously meant that Gu Lingtian had really found a way back then.

haha, Gu Lingtian is indeed a rare hero. I didn’t expect him to find a way. It’s a pity for him. If he wasn’t so ambitious, his achievements wouldn’t be any less than mine!

Dandan sighed. It was rare to see such an exaggerated person.

Gu Xinghui’s eyes were also a little dim.

Senior turtle, please follow me!

Said Gu Xinghui. Then, he made a gesture of invitation and walked towards the depths of the Gu family.

Lu Ming, dandan, and Mu Lan followed.

The other members of the Gu family also left.

Lu Ming and the other two followed Gu Xinghui and flew across a large area of halls, arriving at a peaceful place.

It was very quiet here, and there was only a small house made of purple bamboo.

It was quiet and elegant.

There was a small courtyard outside the small house. There was a stone table with a few stone stools beside it.

senior turtle, please take a seat. I’ll be right back!

Gu Xinghui said and then walked into the bamboo house. After a while, he took out a bronze box and walked out.

“This is what my father left behind!”

Gu Xinghui said. Then, he opened the bronze box, and a Jade box appeared.

my father put all his research in this Jade box. However, no one has been able to open it since my father passed away. There is a formation on it. If you open it by force, the jade box and the things inside it will be destroyed!

Gu Xinghui said.

“It can’t be opened? It can’t be!”

Dandan was speechless.

Lu Ming’s heart sank.

that’s right. However, I’m guessing that father wants to leave it for someone fated, such as young brother Lu Ming, who has yet to become a great emperor but has already mastered many types of laws. Young brother Lu Ming, you can take a look at it. Perhaps you can open it!

Gu Xinghui passed the jade box to Lu Ming.

Lu Ming took it and studied it carefully.

The surface of the jade box was covered with dense runes.

Lu Ming looked at it for a long time but could not find anything.

“Let me see!”

Dandan shouted.

Lu Ming passed the jade box to dandan and she studied it carefully.

He was an expert in formations, and as expected, he had made a huge discovery. His eyes lit up, and he said,” no wonder no one can open it. It turns out that it requires such conditions. Haha!

“Dandan, you can tell?”

Lu Ming asked.

“Of course, don’t you know who I am? The head of the top ten Battle Beasts, the world God turtle. I can’t see it without a formation. If you want to open this Jade box, you need two conditions!”

“First, I need to use Saint energy!”

second, five types of nomological laws need to be used at the same time, but there are no rules on which five types of nomological laws to use!

these two conditions are very simple individually, but when put together, it’s very harsh, because the two conditions need to be completed by the same person!

Dandan explained.

The few of them were stunned for a moment before they immediately reacted.

This condition was very obvious. It required a person who had yet to become a divine Emperor but could master five types of laws at the same time. This was what Gu Lingtian had left for people like him.

“Lu Ming, take it and try it!”

Dandan handed the jade box to Lu Ming.

Lu Ming took it and circulated his holy power according to dandan’s instructions. He controlled the five types of laws at the same time and shrouded the jade box.

Buzzzzzz!

As expected, the jade box started to move. It began to glow, and the runes on it flowed. Finally, with a Kacha sound, the jade box opened.

There was a Jade token in the jade box.

“It’s open!”

Gu Xinghui was also very excited.

Lu Ming, dandan, and Mu Lan were also very excited.

“Lu Ming, hurry up and take a look. Is there a way for you to successfully vindicate your Dao and become an Emperor?”

Dandan said excitedly.

Lu Ming took a deep breath, took out the Jade card, and sank his spiritual sense into it.

“My life is Gu Lingtian …”

Immediately, a voice rang in Lu Ming’s mind.

After a long while, Lu Ming put down the Jade token and looked surprised.’There, there’s really a way.. I can become an Emperor!”
